Class LinearBasisFunctionModel<N extends Number>

java.lang.Object
net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination<N>
net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>
All Implemented Interfaces:
NumberTypeAgnostic<N>, LinearModel<N>, EstimationFunction<N>, ScalarEstimationFunction<N>, TrainableScalarFunction<N>, UnaryEstimationFunction<N>, TrainableFunction<N>
@Strategy(CONCRETE) public class LinearBasisFunctionModel<N extends Number> extends LinearCombination<N> implements LinearModel<N>, UnaryEstimationFunction<N>

    • estimateScalar

      public N estimateScalar(N[] inputs)
      Description copied from class: LinearCombination
      Estimates the scalar output of this linear model for the given input vector.

      The computation is: 

         output = bias + Î£ (inputs[i] * weights[i])
      Specified by:
      estimateScalar in interface ScalarEstimationFunction<N extends Number>
